content:
I found the Taylor series for sin/cos/arctan/exp/log but not for Complex.tan.
We have docs#bernoulli, so we can define the series.
Is someone working on it?
(csc, sec, cot also seem to be missing)
Oh, where is the Taylor series for arctan? I was annoyed that it seems many lemmas about iterated derivatives of arctan were missing.
Thanks. That does indeed avoid the iterated derivative lemmas I wanted.
